examples.example: 我期待着自己快快长大，去探索更广阔的世界。

translate.english: I am looking forward to growing up quickly to explore a broader world.

examples.example: 我相信等孩子们长大以后，一定能成为对社会有贡献的人。

translate.english: I believe that when the children grow up, they will definitely be able to become people who contribute to the society.

examples.example: 看着孩子一天天长大，父母心中满是欣慰和自豪。

translate.english: Watching the children grow up day by day, the parents are full of comfort and pride in their hearts.
